About

About me

#software_engineer #foodie #trying_to_loose_weight

Originally from Jhansi, India, now lives in London, UK. I have been working in the industry for ~10 years, and I am passionate about building products and even the boring stuff. Professionally, my skills are in Python, Django, AWS, Celery, Kafka, RabbitMQ, ETL/ELT and fairly DevOps.

I am an introvert but still here are my social links.
